Class MultipleFilesOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.result.textwriter.MultipleFilesOutput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class MultipleFilesOutput
extends Object
implements StreamFactory
    Manage output to multiple files.
